Package org.youscope.common.configuration

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Configuration
    Marker interface that a given object is a YouScope configuration file.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CameraConfiguration
    Configuration of a camera, identifier by its camera device name.
    ChannelConfiguration
    Configuration of a channel, identified by its channel name and configuration group name.
    FocusConfiguration
    Configuration of a focus device (with focus adjustment time).
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigurationException  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    YSConfigAlias
    Alias for a member field (i.e.
    YSConfigClassification
    Classification for a given configuration class.
    YSConfigConditional
    Marks a conditional configuration property.
    YSConfigDescription
    Human readable description for a member field (i.e.
    YSConfigDoubleRange
    Allowed range of a douvle property.
    YSConfigIcon
    Sets an icon (location) for a given configuration.
    YSConfigIntegerRange
    Allowed range of an integer property.
    YSConfigNotVisible
    Marks a bean property to be not included in UIs
